functions.tag: {fire_arrow:1b,CustomPotionColor:15240492,display:{Name:'[{"text":"Fire Arrow","italic":false,"color":"#ff3300"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"With a bag of incendiary gunpowder","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"attached to the shaft of the arrow,","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"it spreads fire at landingpoint.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"must be held with offhand.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:24,Duration:1200}]}

{CustomPotionColor:4184457,display:{Name:'[{"text":"Great Potion of the Luky One","italic":false,"color":"#99ff33"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Lifts up the adventurer\'s mood.","italic":false,"color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"More loot can be found in chests","italic":false,"color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"and barrels.","italic":false,"color":"dark_gray"}]']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:26,Duration:36000,Amplifier:9}]}

{CustomPotionColor:7999259,display:{Name:'[{"text":"Great Potion of the Bull","italic":false,"color":"#990000"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Burning like fire, but providing","italic":false,"color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"a lot of strenght and resistance.","italic":false,"color":"dark_gray"}]']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:22,Duration:3600,Amplifier:3},{Id:11,Duration:6000,Amplifier:2},{Id:5,Duration:6000,Amplifier:4}]}

{CustomPotionColor:593183,display:{Name:'[{"text":"Lingering Potion of Withering","italic":false,"color":"dark_gray"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"Brewed from the roots of a wither","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"rose, it poisons the mind of every","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"creature.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"Keep your distance..","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:15,Duration:600},{Id:20,Duration:600,Amplifier:2}]}
